Text: hello bookzilla; i wish i had the time to read all your terrific books. great uploads!
I downloaded this file, but was unable to open it with Adobe. The file was either not supported to was damaged. Is there any way I can open and read this file? Thanks in advance for any help.

AcePredator: There are several ways to open/read epub files.  Firefox has a plugin EPUBReader, as does Chrome with MagicScroll.  There are also ebook readers/managers like calibre and mobipocket.  I'm not sure what Mac or iPad users do, but Android has some good ebook readers. Right night, I've been using Cool Reader a lot, but I've also got Aldiko as a backup.  Google "ebook reader" with your operating system to find out what other people are using.  (i.e. ebook reader Windows 8).  Good luck!  :-)
gh0timan: Thanks very much for the helpful information. I'll follow your advice and see what happens.
Thanks! An excellent book...should be mandatory reading for 8th grade and up!
